name: SolarBlack
abstract: SolarBlack is an action-rhythm game made exclusively for VR where you slice and shoot to the beat to defeat an other-worldly threat.

detail.app_languages: Portuguese, Korean, Italian, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Russian
detail.app_release_note:
Greetings interstellar travelers üöÄ

This new update brings some new tweaks and a brand new soundtrack to your home system. Here's what you can expect in this update:

two new songs
Like the universe, our song list is slowly but steadily expanding.

If you're a Beat Saber gamer, there's a good chance you're familiar with the high-octane tracks from Schwank's music. As you launch SolarBlack as part of your fitness routine, listen to Schwank's "Fresh!" to get the beat going.

Or, if your workout routine lacks a bit of rock, you can listen to Rohrenreit12's "Think" rock.

User interface tweaks
After the update, you will notice some tweaks in different aspects.
If you suddenly feel like you need a refresher on how to play SolarBlack, jump into the tutorial and you'll now see more information.
Discover the differentiators of different levels of difficulty in the mode. There are a lot of ‚ÄúD‚Äôs‚Äù these days.

We hope you enjoy the new updates!
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
